duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to external and internal customer inquiries through phone calls, ensuring excellent service and exhibiting strong problem-solving skills.
Participate in continuous improvement initiatives and track customer engagement performance through recorded call types.
Multi-task, set priorities, and manage time effectively to provide a high level of professionalism and collaborate solutions with the team.
Be resourceful and proactive in dealing with issues, demonstrate strong written and verbal communication skills, and have efficient typing and data entry skills.
Exhibit strong phone skills, including soft skills and active listening, and provide attention to detail and quality in customer interactions.
Adapt to different personality types and work effectively with a wide range of constituencies in a diverse community.
Handle several assignments at one time while providing attention to detail and resolving complex requests from customers.
Research, resolve, and direct phone calls effectively while utilizing multiple computer programs simultaneously.
Review recorded calls that are scored/evaluated and engage in individual reviews to improve skills and deliver a better customer experience.
